For my first visit I had great service and even better crepes! Had a flambé and it was delicioso! Ambiance was warm and cozy. Service was also inviting and awesome! Plus a crepe shop open till 3am is like a dream come true! During my second visit, it was only the girl working and so we literally didn't get orders taken until 10min after sitting. And my crepe flambé was super disappointing - it couldn't even hold a flame. The second visit was a complete 360 but I'll attribute it to being short staffed.
